text: Saat Bhai Champa is an Indian Bengali fantasy television soap opera that premiered on 27 November 2017 and airs on Zee Bangla. It is produced by Surinder Films and stars Pramita Chakraborty, Rudrajit Mukherjee and Sudipa Banerjee. The show is dubbed in Hindi as "Shoorveer sister" which airs on Big Magic channel. The Odia dubbed version is aired on Zee Sarthak. It was premiered on 27 November 2017 and aired everyday at 8:00 PM on Zee Bangla. It went off air on 3 March 2019 and it got replaced by Trinayani. ==Plot== The selfish queens led by the 1st queen Manimallika of King Mahendra of Surjanagar try to kill the seven sons and one daughter of the seventh queen Padmavati. The seven brothers become Champa flowers. The daughter Parul is rescued by the maid. Through a series of adventures Princess Parul has to bring back alive her seven long-lost brothers (who are now Champa flowers) and reunite her family. She finds brave Raghav as her partner and evil witch Rani Manimallika as her main enemy. On the day of the wedding, Raghav gets lost, was made a king of another country by an elephant. One wicked sorcerer and the evil queen are behind all of this. Princess Parul rescues him and kills Manimallika with the help of her friends. She marries Raghav and lives happily ever after in Surjanagar. ==Cast== ===Main=== * Pramita Chakraborty / Roosha Chatterjee as Parul (Protagonist) * Rudrajit Mukherjee as Raghav (Protagonist) * Sudipta Banerjee as Rani Monimallika (Primary antagonist) ===Recurring=== * Samrat Mukherjee as Mahendra/Surendra. * Solanki Roy / Sonali Chowdhury as Rani Padmavati. * Manoshi Sengupta as Rani Swetanghshi. * Liza Goswami as Rani Lolontika. * Sayantani Guhathakurta as Rani Dakahini. * Priyanka Rati Pal as Rani Bonhisikha. * Nayana Bandyopadhyay as Rani Maya and a mermaid Sankhomala. * Sabyasachi Chowdhury as King * Tania Ganguly as The Serpent * Rupsha Mukhopadhyay as Urmimala * Sambhabhi as Sankhomala daughter * Moyna Banerjee as Gaitri Dashi * Palash Ganguly as Veer Pratap * Madhubani Goswami ==References== Category:2017 Indian television series debuts Category:Bengali- language television programming in India
title: Saat Bhai Champa (TV series)
